attributes.action: Give Dental Nurses a pay rise / set hourly rate
attributes.additional_details:
We are working in people's mouths / covid highest risk job. 
We have to get a qualification to become a dental nurse to earn minimum wage! (Not living wage)
People working in retail are earning more 
Dentist couldn't do their job without a nurse so pay us fairly and appropriate for what we do full time
attributes.background: Give Dental nurses a set hourly rate which is fair for our qualified jobs that we have studied for. And not leave it to our employee to pay us minimum wage for a job we have had to study for and have a qualification for.

rejection.details:
Dental nurses are usually employed directly by dental practice owners, so decisions about dental nurses' terms and conditions of employment, including pay, are a matter for practice owners, and not the Government or House of Commons.

You could start a petition calling for the Government to increase the pay band for dental nurses employed directly by the NHS, if this something you would like to happen.
